title: Finally Saved
description: Libby Ashford is finally free of her living nightmare. On the run from her father, she and her mother move to a new town to start fresh and forget their past. Easier said than done. Starting at her new school, Libby already runs into trouble when she feels an intense connection to the school’s resident bad boy. Nicholas St.Claire runs not only the school, but the largest pack in North America. Thrown together by the plans of fate, it isn’t long before they’re both wrapped up in lies as Libby’s past comes back to haunt her. This time though, she has something she didn’t have before. Nick.
author: raylor17
